Parent.definition: a person who begets or brings forth offspring ;esp

1 a.definition: a person who begets or brings forth offspringthe natural parents of a child born of their marriage

sub_terms.b: a person who legally adopts a child
sub_terms.c: a person or entity that owes to a child a legally imposed duty of support
sub_terms.d: a stepparent where designated by statute

1 a.note: The biological father of an illegitimate child is usually not considered the child's parent absent a judicial determination of paternity. There have been exceptions, based mainly on the father's attitude toward, support of, or involvement with the child.

2.definition: an entity or group that gives rise to or acquires another usually subsidiary entity or group [a company]a corporation that owns a required minimum percentage of the stock of another corporation compare
